THE ALL-NEW MONT BLANC BOA®

Comfort, meet speed.

Tackle the toughest trails for miles with a precise fit in the all-new Mont Blanc BOA® ultimate long-distance trail shoe.

customhtml2_copy_cop._customHTML:
DIAL IN YOUR BEST FIT.

The all-new Mont Blanc BOA® is equipped with the BOA® Fit System, which allows for a micro-adjustable, precision fit. Gain a closer connection to the trail and superior stability on dynamic terrain. Adjust in a matter of seconds to achieve your personalized fit throughout the day as conditions change.

customhtml2_copy_cop_1057409756._customHTML:

ultra excursions

Ultimate grip

According to Vibram®, Vibram® Litebase midsole reduces weight while maintaining Vibram® quality in grip, traction, and durability.

Natural performance
on the trails

The Mont Blanc BOA® features our Standard FootShapeâ„¢ Fit, our most common fit found in Altra Running® shoes. This feature allows your toes to relax and sit naturally for miles on rugged terrain, encouraging the best performance for your long-distance run.
